MAIN_MESSAGE: Our engineers need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30 PM affecting the electricity supply in the LL48 and  LL49 area of Porthmadog and Penrhyduedreath. This is to safely carry out repair work on the overhead line network for properties in local area near to Beudy fron Oleu and surrounding area. We expect power to be back on by 5 PM and will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. To protect electrical equipment we advise you to switch off and unplug appliances including boilers where it is safe to do so. For further assistance you can call us on 0800 001 5400. Thank you for your patience.
